ch.qos.logback.classic.spi

Interface Configurator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContextAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicConfigurator

    public interface Configurator
extends ContextAware
    Allows programmatic initialization and configuration of Logback. The ServiceLoader is typically used to instantiate implementations and thus implementations will need to follow the guidelines of the ServiceLoader specifically a no-arg constructor is required.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(LoggerContext loggerContext)
      The context will also be set before this method is called via ContextAware.setContext(ch.qos.logback.core.Context).

      • Methods inherited from interface ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAware

        addError, addError, addInfo, addInfo, addStatus, addWarn, addWarn, getContext, setContext
